title: A cycle track shall be developed in green belt areas earmarked on Development Plan along the rivers
clause_text: A cycle track shall be developed in green belt areas earmarked on Development Plan along the rivers. Also, cycle track be developed along the major nallah.
section: 3.13 DEVELOPMENT OF CYCLE TRACK ALONG RIVER AND NALLAH

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: A cycle track shall be developed in green belt areas earmarked on Development Plan along the rivers. Also, cycle track be developed along the major nallah.
